ygData.subject: Re: Lost in High Hold
ygData.msgSnippet: Not only that, but the guards in Highhold will NOT protect you.  Especially for the prisoners who are just one level lower... I learned the hard way. Vanir on
ygData.messageBody:
Not only that, but the guards in Highhold will NOT protect you. Especially
for the prisoners who are just one level lower...

I learned the hard way.

Vanir on Tunare

HiFi Review wrote:

> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> You guys are gonna get this poor fellow killed! The vendor is in the
> first room on the left once you get into the main hall. There is
> nothing of interest for a low level character on the floor with the
> bank. Get your money and go back upstairs.
>
> --- "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...> wrote:
> > From: "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...>
> >
> > He is across the main hall from the bank. The room
> > he's in looks like a
> > library
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Michael O'Reilly [mailto:michael@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 5:48 PM
> > To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Lost in High Hold
> >
> >
> > From: Michael O'Reilly <michael@...>
> >
> > I found the guy once, to buy the 8th level animation
> > spell. It's very
> > dangerous there, but not impossible. Invisibility is
> > the key, as you
> > probably know since you were in the keep. The
> > merchant is an Erudite,
> > and he's up on the second floor of the keep. I can't
> > give specific
> > directions, as I was just running around until I
> > found him, then gated
> > out immediately after I memorized the spell. I don't
> > remember his name,
> > either, but he was the only Erudite I recall seeing
> > there.
> >
> > Good luck.
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Manuel Revilla
> > [mailto:manuel.revilla@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 4:33 PM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqenchanters] Lost in High Hold
> >
> > From: "Manuel Revilla"
> > <manuel.revilla@...>
> >
> > This may be a very stupid question, but I have
> > explored
> > the courtyard and
> > been down to the bank. I can't find the Animated
> > Spell
> > merchant. Would
> > someone please give me a hint as to where he is
> > hiding?
> > The place seems
> > extremely dangerous. Thanks!
> >
> > Manny Revilla
> > Visit "Twilight Realms" at
> > http://www.twilightrealms.com
> > e-mail: twilight@... or
> > manuel.revilla@...
> >
